      • ateObjectiveItem

        public int ateObjectiveItem()
        Returns:
        interger score adds to the score which counts how many objectives the snake has eaten

      • changeDirection

        public void changeDirection(CurrentDirection direction)
        Parameters:
        direction - changes the current direction of the snake depending on the input by the keyboard

      • checkIfDead

        public boolean checkIfDead()
        Returns:
        isDead checks if the snake ran into a wall or over itself and returning the status of if its dead

      • didEatObjectiveItem

        public boolean didEatObjectiveItem()
        Returns:
        boolean checks if snake ate an objective item and if the answer is yes then add a unit length to the snake, if not then do nothing

      • move

        public void move()
        the snake starts out going right and depending on what the keyboard input is it will change its direction its either right, left, up, or down

      • randomObjectiveItem

        public void randomObjectiveItem()
        generates a random objective item that is not within the snakes unit length

      • updatePosition

                           int y)
        Parameters:
        x - rows
        y - columns updates the positions of the snake (how long it is)
